languages.text: Full and partial covers give you the opportunity to avoid enemy attacks. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Full cover{/g}, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduces the chance to be hit by 60%. Partial cover reduces it by 35%. At the same time, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose. Some cover can be destroyed by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, and other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. Destructible cover has a durability bar above it. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Single shot{/g} can penetrate through any cover.
languages.original_text: Полные и частичные укрытия дают вам возможность избежать вражеских атак. Полные укрытия, обозначенные черепом на щите, уменьшают шанс попадания в персонажа на 60%. Частичные — на 35%. При этом шанс попасть в персонажа за укрытием может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры. Некоторые укрытия могут быть разрушены {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаками ближнего боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаками по области{/g} и другими способностями — над разрушаемыми укрытиями расположена шкала прочности. Одиночный выстрел может пробить любое укрытие насквозь.

traits.locale_text:
Full and partial covers grant you the opportunity to avoid enemy attacks.
Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduces the chance to hit by 60%. Partial cover reduces it by 35%. At the same time, Single Shot can penetrate through any cover.
Some covers can be destroyed with melee attacks, area attacks and other abilities. Destructible covers have a durability barabove them.

Full and partial covers give you the opportunity to avoid enemy attacks. Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduces the chance to be hit by 60%. Partial cover reduces it by 35%. At the same time, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose. Some cover can be destroyed by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, and other abilities. Destructible cover has a durability bar above it. Single shot can penetrate through any cover.

Full and partial covers give you the opportunity to avoid enemy attacks. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Full cover{/g}, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduces the chance to be hit by 60%. Partial cover reduces it by 35%. At the same time, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose. Some cover can be destroyed by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, and other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. Destructible cover has a durability bar above it. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Single shot{/g} can penetrate through any cover.

Full and partial covers give you the opportunity to avoid enemy attacks. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Full cover{/g}, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduces the chance to be hit by 60%. Partial cover reduces it by 35%. At the same time, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose. Some cover can be destroyed by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, and other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. Destructible cover has a durability bar above it. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Single shot{/g} can penetrate through any cover.

languages.text: Полные и частичные укрытия дают вам возможность избежать вражеских атак, идущих со стороны укрытия. Полные укрытия, обозначенные черепом на щите, уменьшают шанс попадания в персонажа на 60%. Частичные, обозначенные щитом — на 35%. При этом шанс попасть в персонажа за укрытием может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры. Некоторые укрытия могут быть разрушены {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаками ближнего боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаками по области{/g} и другими способностями — над разрушаемыми укрытиями расположена шкала прочности. Одиночный выстрел может пробить любое укрытие насквозь, не разрушая его полностью.
languages.original_text: Full and partial covers give you the opportunity to avoid enemy attacks. Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduces the chance to hit by 60%. Partial cover reduces it by by 35%. At the same time, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose. Some covers can be destroyed by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} and other abilities. Destructible covers have a durability bar above them. Single Shot can penetrate any cover through.

traits.locale_text:
Полные и частичные укрытия дают вам возможность избежать вражеских атак.
Полные укрытия, обозначенные черепом на щите, уменьшают шанс попадания в персонажа на 60%. Частичные — на 35%. При этом шанс попасть в персонажа за укрытием может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры.
Некоторые укрытия могут быть разрушены {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаками ближнего боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаками по области{/g} и другими способностями — над разрушаемыми укрытиями расположена шкала прочности. Одиночный выстрел может пробить любое укрытие насквозь.

Полные и частичные укрытия дают вам возможность избежать вражеских атак.
Полные укрытия, обозначенные черепом на щите, уменьшают шанс попадания в персонажа на 60%. Частичные — на 35%. При этом шанс попасть в персонажа за укрытием может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры.
Некоторые укрытия могут быть разрушены {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаками ближнего боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаками по области{/g} и другими способностями — над разрушаемыми укрытиями расположена шкала прочности. Одиночный выстрел может пробить любое укрытие насквозь.

languages.text: La cobertura completa y parcial te permite evitar los ataques enemigos. La {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura completa{/g}, indicada con una calavera en el escudo, reduce la probabilidad de recibir un impacto en un 60 %. La cobertura parcial la reduce en un 35 %. Ten en cuenta que la probabilidad de impactar a un personaje a cubierto puede variar en función de la dificultad del juego. Algunos tipos de cobertura se pueden destruir con {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} y otras {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}. La cobertura rompible tiene encima una barra de aguante. Los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}un solo disparo{/g} pueden atravesar cualquier tipo de cobertura.
languages.original_text: Full and partial covers give you the opportunity to avoid enemy attacks. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Full cover{/g}, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduces the chance to be hit by 60%. Partial cover reduces it by 35%. At the same time, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose. Some cover can be destroyed by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, and other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. Destructible cover has a durability bar above it. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Single shot{/g} can penetrate through any cover.

traits.locale_text: La cobertura completa y parcial te permite evitar los ataques enemigos. La {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura completa{/g}, indicada con una calavera en el escudo, reduce la probabilidad de recibir un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} en un 60 %. La cobertura parcial la reduce en un 35 %. Ten en cuenta que la probabilidad de impactar a un personaje a cubierto puede variar en función de la dificultad del juego. Algunos tipos de cobertura se pueden destruir con {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} y otras {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}. La cobertura rompible tiene encima una barra de aguante. Los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}un solo disparo{/g} pueden atravesar cualquier tipo de cobertura.

languages.text: 完全遮蔽と部分的遮蔽は、敵の攻撃を避ける機会を与えてくれる。 ドクロのついたシールドで示される{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}完全遮蔽{/g}は、命中率を60％減少させる。部分的遮蔽は35%減少させる。一方、遮蔽に隠れているキャラクターに命中する確率は、選択したゲームの難易度によって異なる場合がある。 遮蔽の中には、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}、その他の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で破壊できるものもある。破壊可能な遮蔽の上には耐久バーが表示される。{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}はいかなる遮蔽も貫通できる。
languages.original_text: Full and partial covers give you the opportunity to avoid enemy attacks. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Full cover{/g}, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduces the chance to be hit by 60%. Partial cover reduces it by 35%. At the same time, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose. Some cover can be destroyed by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, and other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. Destructible cover has a durability bar above it. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Single shot{/g} can penetrate through any cover.

traits.locale_text: フルカバーと部分的カバーは、敵の攻撃を避ける機会を与えてくれる。 ドクロのついたシールドで示される{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}フルカバー{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}率を60％減少させる。部分的カバーは35%減少させる。一方、カバーに隠れているキャラクターに命中する確率は、選択したゲームの難易度によって異なる場合がある。 カバーの中には、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}エリア攻撃{/g}、その他の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で破壊できるものもある。破壊可能なカバーの上には耐久バーが表示される。{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}はどのカバーも貫通できる。

languages.text: 全身掩体与半身掩体让你有机会闪避敌人的攻击。 {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}全身掩体{/g}以带有骷髅的盾牌表示，可以降低60%被命中的几率。半身掩体可以降低35%被击中的几率。此外，根据游戏难度不同，攻击穿过掩体击中掩体后方角色的几率也会不同。 部分掩体可以被{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}与其他{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}摧毁。可以摧毁的掩体上方有耐久条。{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}可以击穿任何掩体。
languages.original_text: Full and partial covers give you the opportunity to avoid enemy attacks. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Full cover{/g}, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduces the chance to be hit by 60%. Partial cover reduces it by 35%. At the same time, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose. Some cover can be destroyed by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, and other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. Destructible cover has a durability bar above it. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Single shot{/g} can penetrate through any cover.

traits.locale_text: 全身掩体与半身掩体让你有机会闪避敌人的攻击。 {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}全身掩体{/g}以带有骷髅的盾牌表示，可以降低60%被{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}的几率。半身掩体可以降低35%被击中的几率。此外，根据游戏难度不同，攻击穿过掩体击中掩体后方角色的几率也会不同。 部分掩体可以被{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}与其他{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}摧毁。可以摧毁的掩体上方有耐久条。{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}可以击穿任何掩体。

languages.text: Voll- und Teildeckungen geben dir die Möglichkeit, gegnerischen Angriffen auszuweichen. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Volle Deckung{/g}, angezeigt durch einen Totenkopf auf dem Schild, verringert die Chance, getroffen zu werden, um 60 %. Teilweise Deckung verringert sie um 35 %. Gleichzeitig kann die Chance, einen Charakter hinter einer Deckung zu treffen, je nach gewähltem Schwierigkeitsgrad des Spiels variieren. Einige Deckungen können durch {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} und andere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} zerstört werden. Zerstörbare Deckung hat einen Haltbarkeitsbalken. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Ein einzelner Schuss{/g} kann jede Deckung durchdringen.
languages.original_text: Full and partial covers give you the opportunity to avoid enemy attacks. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Full cover{/g}, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduces the chance to be hit by 60%. Partial cover reduces it by 35%. At the same time, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose. Some cover can be destroyed by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, and other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. Destructible cover has a durability bar above it. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Single shot{/g} can penetrate through any cover.

traits.locale_text: Voll- und Teildeckungen geben dir die Möglichkeit, gegnerischen Angriffen auszuweichen. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Volle Deckung{/g}, angezeigt durch einen Totenkopf auf dem Schild, verringert die Chance, {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffen{/g} zu werden, um 60%. Teilweise Deckung verringert sie um 35%. Gleichzeitig kann die Chance, einen Charakter hinter einer Deckung zu treffen, je nach gewähltem Schwierigkeitsgrad des Spiels variieren. Manche Deckung kann durch {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} und andere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} zerstört werden. Zerstörbare Deckung weist einen Haltbarkeitsbalken auf. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Ein einzelner Schuss{/g} kann jede Deckung durchdringen.

languages.text: Les couvertures totales et partielles vous permettent d'éviter les attaques ennemies. Une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture totale{/g}, représentée par une tête de mort sur le bouclier, réduit les chances d'être touché de 60 % contre 35 % pour une couverture partielle. Les chances de toucher un personnage à couvert peuvent varier selon le niveau difficulté que vous choisissez. Certaines couvertures peuvent être détruites par des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g}, des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} et d'autres {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}. Une couverture destructible est surmontée d'une barre de durabilité. Des tirs {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}au coup par coup{/g} peuvent pénétrer n'importe quelle couverture.
languages.original_text: Full and partial covers give you the opportunity to avoid enemy attacks. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Full cover{/g}, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduces the chance to be hit by 60%. Partial cover reduces it by 35%. At the same time, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose. Some cover can be destroyed by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, and other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. Destructible cover has a durability bar above it. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Single shot{/g} can penetrate through any cover.

La {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture totale{/g}, indiquée par une tête de mort sur le bouclier, réduit les chances d'être {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touché{/g} de 60 % contre 35 % pour la couverture partielle. Les chances de toucher un personnage à couvert peuvent varier selon le niveau difficulté que vous choisissez. Certaines couvertures peuvent être détruites par des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g}, des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} et d'autres {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}. Une couverture destructible est surmontée d'une barre de durabilité. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Tir au coup par coup{/g} peut pénétrer n'importe quelle couverture.

Les couvertures totales et partielles vous permettent d'éviter les attaques ennemies. La {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture totale{/g}, indiquée par une tête de mort sur le bouclier, réduit les chances d'être touché de 60 % contre 35 % pour la couverture partielle. Les chances de toucher un personnage à couvert peuvent varier selon le niveau difficulté que vous choisissez. Certaines couvertures peuvent être détruites par des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g}, des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} et d'autres {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}. Une couverture destructible est surmontée d'une barre de durabilité. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Tir au coup par coup{/g} peut pénétrer n'importe quelle couverture.

languages.text: Tam ve kısmi siperler, sana düşman saldırılarından sakınma fırsatı verirler. Kalkan üzerine kafatası ile gösterilen {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}tam siper{/g}, vurulma olasılığını %60 azaltır. Kısmi siper ise bu olasılığı %35 azaltır. Aynı zamanda siper arkasındaki bir karakteri vurabilme olasılığı, oyunun seçtiğin zorluk seviyesine bağlı olarak değişebilir. Bazı siperler; {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}yakın dövüş saldırılarıyla{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırılarıyla{/g} ve diğer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerle{/g} imha edilebilir. İmha edilebilen siperlerin üzerinde bir sağlamlık barı bulunur. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Tek atış{/g}, her türlü siperi delip geçebilir.
languages.original_text: Full and partial covers give you the opportunity to avoid enemy attacks. {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Full cover{/g}, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduces the chance to be hit by 60%. Partial cover reduces it by 35%. At the same time, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose. Some cover can be destroyed by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, and other {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. Destructible cover has a durability bar above it. {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Single shot{/g} can penetrate through any cover.
